Error.description: This is the schema definition for the Error resource.
Error.longDescription: This is the schema definition for the Error resource. It represents the properties of an error response.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

error.description: The object containing the error information.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

@Message.ExtendedInfo.description: An array of message objects describing one or more error message(s).

code.description: A string indicating a specific MessageId from the message registry. 'Base.1.0.GeneralError' should be used only if there is no better message.

message.description: A human readable error message corresponding to the message in the message registry.

title: #Error.v1_0_0
